hadiths.text: Ali b. Abi Talib reported the Prophet (ﷺ) as saying:He narrated the tradition to the same effect, but he did not mention the words "until the age of eating". This version adds: Qatadah said: This is valid until the time they do not eat food; when they begin to eat, their urine should be washed

chapter.eng-name: A Child's Urine Splashes On A Garment
